stories.title: Create DevQuickLogin component
stories.description: Create a development-only component for quick user login
acceptance_criteria: Component returns null when NODE_ENV is not 'development'
Component shows dropdown with three users: Chris, Candice, Adrian
Uses useAuth hook for login functionality
Shows loading state during login attempt
Shows toast error if login fails
Calls onSuccess callback after successful login

stories.title: Add DevQuickLogin to login page
stories.description: Integrate the DevQuickLogin component into the login page
acceptance_criteria: DevQuickLogin component is rendered on login page
Component appears below the login form links
Clicking a user triggers login and redirects to home page
Component is not visible in production build
